targets.expr: avg(cache_total{instance=~"$instance", type="hit"}) by (name) / avg(cache_total{instance=~"$instance", type="all"}) by (name)

panels.title: The time consumed of task(pending and active)
The time consumed of different stages(50%)
The time consumed of different stages(75%)
The time consumed of different stages(100%)

targets.expr: sum(iot_consensus{instance=~"$instance", name="ioTConsensusServerImpl", type="searchIndex"}) by (region) - sum(iot_consensus{instance=~"$instance", name="ioTConsensusServerImpl", type="safeIndex"}) by (region)

panels.description: Gap between write and fastest LogDispatcherThread in one region

targets.expr: sum(iot_consensus{instance=~"$instance", name="ioTConsensusServerImpl", type="searchIndex"}) by (region) - max(iot_consensus{instance=~"$instance", name=~"logDispatcher.*", type="currentSyncIndex"}) by (region)

panels.title: Min Peer Sync Lag

panels.description: Gap between fastest LogDispatcherThread and slowest LogDispatcherThread in one region

targets.expr: max(iot_consensus{instance=~"$instance", name=~"logDispatcher.*", type="currentSyncIndex"}) by (region) - min(iot_consensus{instance=~"$instance", name=~"logDispatcher.*", type="currentSyncIndex"}) by (region)

panels.title: Sync speed diff of Peers
The time consumed of GC(per minute)

targets.legendFormat: The total number of jvm thread
